articles.title: A Simple Sticker Could Allow People With Voice Disorders to Speak Again - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A new adhesive patch could one day help people with voice disorders speak again by using artificial intelligence to read the movements of their throat muscles and turn them into speech, researchers said Tuesday.
